 void cs()
          Clears the console screen by placing many println's
 Role runAdventureMenu(Role character)
          Runs the menu for AdventureMenu From Here the player can choose what location they wish to adventure in with their selected character All experience and gold will be saved and returned back to Menu
 void runNoobieLand()
          Runs the NoobieLand adventure of 10 enemies dropping 40 xp and 20 gold each
 void runPlains()
          Runs the Plains adventure Here there are 10 enemies dropping 80xp and 30gold each

Clears the console screen by placing many println's

runAdventureMenu

public Role runAdventureMenu(Role character)
Runs the menu for AdventureMenu From Here the player can choose what location they wish to adventure in with their selected character All experience and gold will be saved and returned back to Menu

public void runNoobieLand()
